Comment: Full form potentially features a supine suffix and what is described as a hortative suffix.
unclear if lengthened or not (rc:kɨt- or rc:k-?)
ewu(h)tu only looks partially cognate, if anything.
The root am does not occur with first person.
Werikyana has long e in this verb, assuming the same pattern for Proto-Waiwaian allows reconciling the divergent Waiwai and Hixkaryána forms.
